title: Wine Label
content:
anyone know this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080220041010im_/http:/typophile.com/files/http___www_6193.beausejour-becot.com_download_becot_fiche_technique_en.pdf.jpg)

Thanks!

 [‹ Font on Everton FC's Jersey](http://web.archive.org/web/20080220041010/http:/typophile.com/node/42084 "Go to previous forum topic") [What fonts is this ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080220041010/http:/typophile.com/node/42080 "Go to next forum topic")
author: scruggsdesign

comments.content:
I think it’s hand-drawn. Look at all the different ’e’s.

- Lex

You’re right. I should have noticed that.

I love the off-weighting though—very charming.

I was watching [Wine Libray TV](http://web.archive.org/web/20080220041010/http:/tv.winelibrary.com/) when Gary Vaynerchuk shoved the bottle in the camera I was like “Ooooo what’s that?” :-)
